channel.title: [508] Codeusa : Login to PVP zone
channel.description: Hello.. I recent made my server again after my computer crashed and now I have a new one and I forgot how to make it where when you login your automatically in a pvp zone if you step out of varrock bank or any safe zone. In my server I had to add ::pvp so people could pk. but in my old one it was always pvp. Please help. Thanks
